What a great idea, Yiming! () Indeed, analyzing famous speeches like Martin Luther King's "I Have a Dream" can help you improve your English speaking skills. The rhythm, flow, and persuasive language used by orators like King are worth studying.

By paying attention to sentence structure, vocabulary, and tone, you can enhance your own public speaking abilities. Try practicing phrases from the speech in front of a mirror or with friends.

Which famous speech would you like to explore next?
